PHRASE.LANG: Gift this and let them rest and relax in the luxury they have become accustomed to.
Offrez ceci et laissez-les se reposer et se relaxer dans le luxe auquel ils se sont habitués.
Schenke dies deinen luxusverwöhnten Freunden, damit sie sich ganz edel entspannen können.
Regalalo e lasciali riposare e rilassarsi nel lusso a cui ormai sono abituati.
Un remanso de paz y bienestar al que no le falta ninguna comodidad.
Gift this and let them rest and relax in the luxury they have become accustomed to.
그들에게 이걸 선물해서 이제는 익숙해진 럭셔리한 휴식과 편안함을 맛보게 하세요.
Gift this and let them rest and relax in the luxury they have become accustomed to.
送好友這棟別墅，讓他們休息兼放鬆，不必委屈自己。
送好友這棟別墅，讓他們休息兼放鬆，不必委屈自己。
Gift this and let them rest and relax in the luxury they have become accustomed to.
